Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Even with the roaring engine from the main building...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: '...I can still hear your every move.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Why are the Forsaken here? What do you want?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I have my reason to be here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'If your "reason" here is to kill my team, you\'d better be ready to die.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Do you think you can stop me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Listen, this stops now. I've got better things to do than chase the Purifying Force.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "If you care about your team, then let them knowâ€”let all of Nikola's minions know...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Or the Forsaken will show no mercy.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Looks like you still won't tell me what you're really up to...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Then there's only one option... to do this the Purifying Force way.", 4: '2'}
